htmlcontent:
This is the placeholder for revision help.

  • Triggering Action: While looking at a previously published record in the DAPTool, the user clicks the Revise Record button

  • The client requests to revise the record.
    DBIO Web Service Action: PATCH /dap/mds3/id/status with input: { action: revise }. (message property is optional.)
    This will change that record state to edit.

  • The client pops up a message with message and an OK button:
    Note: Simple changes to metadata or README files can be published without review. Adding, removing, or making major changes to files will require NPS review before publishing.When the client clicks OK, the landing pages is switched to edit mode.
